name: Pizza Time (Jack Poole)
description:
Pizza Time is a fusion between Spyro and Tony Hawks Pro Skater, with a dash of food-theming.
Fly around the west coast of America collecting ingredients, pizza letters, and solving puzzles in order to create the best dish imaginable.
Soar through 3 different levels in an attempt to score a 5 star performance in the shortest time possible.
Play with a mouse, keyboard, or gamepad in this versatile arcade experience designed to be enjoyed by people of all ages, skill levels, and backgrounds.
